summary:
McDonald's employee: Hello, welcome to McDonald's. What can I get for ya?
Me: Can I get McFuckin' uuuuuuuhhhhh.... Harry Potter...
body:
McDonald’s employee: Hello, welcome to McDonald’s. What can I get for ya?

Me: Can I get McFuckin’ uuuuuuuhhhhh…. Harry Potter AU where Cedric, Fred, Tonks, Remus, Sirius, other fatalities in the Battle of Hogwarts and anyone who’s gonna die in Hogwarts Mystery just, like, don’t die? Can I add wholehearted apologies from the Dursleys for how they mistreated Harry? Neville’s parents are able to have their insanity cured, Draco is able to reach out for help and become Harry’s ally, and Harry doesn’t name his son after a blood-racist who bullied literal children because he was still bitter that Lily rejected his love and unfriended him after he acted like a total asshole? And uhhhhhhhhh…. That’s it for me.

Me: *looks around the fandom* Y'all wanna add anything?

blog.name: books-and-cookies
blog.title: Books are friends, not food
blog.description:
Mary, 30, a lady who has a cottage in a forest and who may or may not be a witch and have the answers to life and everything (lol no, my motto is fake it till you make it). I have loved books ever since I was a little girl. If I could spend my whole day reading, I would. Life unfortunately gets in the way. It's rude, really.

2019 Reading Challenge

Mary has read 3 books toward her goal of 55 books.

summary: “Cedric was lying spread-eagled on the ground beside him. He was dead.” - no joke, this was the moment little ol’ me realised...
body: “Cedric was lying spread-eagled on the ground beside him. He was dead.” - no joke, this was the moment little ol’ me realised that nothing in this world was sacred and we were all doomed to an eternity of misery and heartbreak

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: tomarrywritingprompts
blog.title: Tomarry/Harrymort Writing Prompts
blog.description: All Tomarry and Harrymort prompts and inspiration! Anyone is free to use these prompts for their work, and if you do make something, add a link in a reblog! I'll promo it!

summary: Prompt: (just repeating a classic here) Harry is cursed to take the form of a cat, and no one has any clue how to restore him to...
body: Prompt: (just repeating a classic here) Harry is cursed to take the form of a cat, and no one has any clue how to restore him to normal. Even worse, it seems that the longer Harry is in cat form, the less of his humanity he remembers. Somehow Harry ends up in Voldemort’s lair, but luckily for Harry, it seems Voldemort has a fondness for predators other than snakes, and he treats cat!Harry as kindly as he would treat Nagini. But how will Harry regain human form if his disguise as an ordinary cat is all that’s keeping him safe from Voldemort’s wrath?

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Rose Weasley, Louis Weasley, Albus Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

summary: Moleskine Harry Potter Limited Edition [Lumos] - 2019 Weekly Notebook Diary/Planner
title: Moleskine Harry Potter Limited Edition [Lumos] - 2019 Weekly Notebook Diary/Planner
body:
Size: 9x14cm (pocket)
Cover: Hardcover

Moleskine has always been a pricey choice for notebooks or planners, but sometimes they come out with some special editions that fans could not resist. Like this one, for example. I’m a big Harry Potter fans, and I would love to collect numerous editions of the novel if I have the space and money. But sadly I don’t, so I collect this instead. This Lumos version is available in both Weekly and Daily Planner. Even thought the main content inside is not much of a difference compare with normal editions, but they come with a little illustrated wand movement poster tucked inside the back pocket, it measures at around 15x26 cm.

And the endpaper is illustrated too.

Other than that, there’s a little Spectrespecs glasses printed on the band, which you could cut out and make your own Spectrespecs. But the size is a bit small, it would only fits on children. A larger version is available on the larger size of Harry Potter edition notebook.

Overall, I’m very satisfy with this Harry Potter special edition weekly planner, I will definitely be using this next year.

Next time I will write a post about an other Harry Potter limited edition which is a large ruled notebook, stay tuned!


More photos:

blog.name: darksecretswizards-rpg
blog.title: Dark Secrets of Wizards
blog.description: Año 2025. Tras recuperarse de la Segunda Guerra Mágica, hubo un avance exponencial en todo el mundo mágico, surgiendo los portales que conectan las escuelas entre sí. Sin embargo, aquellos muggles que perdieron familiares durante una guerra que no les correspondía, formaron una alianza llamada "La Orden de Salem", una secta religiosa cuyo objetivo es el exterminio de la magia en el mundo.

summary: ¿Sabías qué?
title: ¿Sabías qué?
body:
Años atrás, tres magos se reunieron y experimentaron con la magia de los trasladadores. De ahí surgió la puerta del velo, con la que crearon varias puertas tras obtener el consentimientos de los diferentes ministerios a escala global.

Dichas puertas se distribuyeron por las escuelas mágicas más importantes, uniéndolas entre sí, creando una conexión entre magos única y veloz.

En cada puerta hay un dragón de piedra al que se le comunica a qué escuela se desea ir, después la puerta se abre y, tras un brillo se encuentra el destino pronunciado. Cuando pasas por la puerta, traspasas un velo que te acaricia y  se escuchan susurros extraños.

Estas puertas sólo llevan a las escuelas, ningún otro destino está a su alcance.

Años atrás, tres magos se reunieron y experimentaron con la magia de los trasladadores. De ahí surgió la puerta del velo, con la que crearon varias puertas tras obtener el consentimientos de los diferentes ministerios a escala global.

Dichas puertas se distribuyeron por las escuelas mágicas más importantes, uniéndolas entre sí, creando una conexión entre magos única y veloz.

En cada puerta hay un dragón de piedra al que se le comunica a qué escuela se desea ir, después la puerta se abre y, tras un brillo se encuentra el destino pronunciado. Cuando pasas por la puerta, traspasas un velo que te acaricia y  se escuchan susurros extraños.

Estas puertas sólo llevan a las escuelas, ningún otro destino está a su alcance.
trail.content:
Años atrás, tres magos se reunieron y experimentaron con la magia de los trasladadores. De ahí surgió la puerta del velo, con la que crearon varias puertas tras obtener el consentimientos de los diferentes ministerios a escala global.

Dichas puertas se distribuyeron por las escuelas mágicas más importantes, uniéndolas entre sí, creando una conexión entre magos única y veloz.

En cada puerta hay un dragón de piedra al que se le comunica a qué escuela se desea ir, después la puerta se abre y, tras un brillo se encuentra el destino pronunciado. Cuando pasas por la puerta, traspasas un velo que te acaricia y  se escuchan susurros extraños.

Estas puertas sólo llevan a las escuelas, ningún otro destino está a su alcance.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Rose Weasley, Louis Weasley, Albus Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!
